DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient rheumatoid arthritis type 2 diabetes experience severe disease course compare control patient osteoarthritis type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Impact Rheumatoid Arthritis Course Type 2 Diabetes During Longitudinal Follow-up 5 Years
DOC.criteria: Patients Adults ( > 18 year ) Rheumatoid arthritis fulfil American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) 1987 European League Against Rheumatism ( ACR/EULAR ) 2010 classification criterion Type 2 diabetes ( HbA1c ≥6.5 % OR fasting glycemia≥7 mmol/l OR glycemia 120 min 75 mg glucose ingestion ≥ 11.1 mmol/l OR symptom hyperglycemia glycemia ≥11.1 mmol/l ) Affiliated social security system Controls Adults ( > 18 year ) match age , sex BMI patient rheumatoid arthritis Osteoarthritis ( knee , hip , spine hand ) Type 2 diabetes disease duration match patient rheumatoid arthritis Affiliated social security system Patient able understand study implication rule Patient oppose participate study Transient diabetes Gestational diabetes Secondary diabetes
